languages.text: Those drills weren't for nothing after all! You start with one more shell loaded into tank.

traits.locale_text: Those drills weren't for nothing after all! You start with one more shell loaded into tank.

languages.text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.
languages.original_text: Вы хорошо знаете, как обращаться с подобной техникой! Вы мгновенно загружаете в танк дополнительный {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасный снаряд{/g}.

languages.text: Вы хорошо знаете, как обращаться с подобной техникой! Вы мгновенно загружаете в танк дополнительный {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасный снаряд{/g}.
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: Ваша боевая подготовка снова приносит плоды! Вы мгновенно загружаете в танк дополнительный {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасный снаряд{/g}.
Ваша боевая подготовка снова приносит плоды! Вы мгновенно загружаете в танк дополнительный {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасный снаряд{/g}.

languages.text: 你很擅长处理这样的机器！你可以立刻为坦克额外装填一枚{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}。
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: 你很擅长处理这样的机器！你可以立刻为坦克额外装填一枚{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}。
之前接受过的训练，最后确实派上了用场！你可以立刻为坦克额外装填一枚{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}。
之前接受过的训练，最后确实派上了用场！你可以立刻为坦克额外装填一枚{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}高爆穿甲弹{/g}。

languages.text: Vous savez parfaitement bien comment vous charger d'une telle machine ! Vous chargez instantanément un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g} supplémentaire dans le char.
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: Vous savez parfaitement bien comment vous charger d'une telle machine ! Vous chargez instantanément un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g} supplémentaire dans le char.
Comme quoi, ces exercices interminables ont fini par payer ! Vous chargez instantanément un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g} supplémentaire dans le char.
Comme quoi, ces exercices interminables ont fini par payer ! Vous chargez instantanément un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obus APHE{/g} supplémentaire dans le char.

languages.text: ¡Sabes bien cómo manejar esta maquinaria! Cargas inmediatamente un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obús perforante explosivo{/g} adicional en el tanque.
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: ¡Sabes bien cómo manejar esta maquinaria! Cargas inmediatamente un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obús perforante explosivo{/g} adicional en el tanque.
¡Esos taladros sí que servían para algo! Cargas al instante un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obús perforante explosivo{/g} adicional en el tanque.
¡Esos taladros sí que servían para algo! Cargas al instante un {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obús perforante explosivo{/g} adicional en el tanque.

languages.text: そのような機械の扱いはよく知っている！戦車に{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}を1枚即座に装填する。
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: そのような機械の扱いはよく知っている！戦車に{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}を1枚即座に装填する。
訓練は無駄ではなかった！戦車に{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}を1枚即座に装填する。

languages.text: Böyle bir makineyle nasıl baş edeceğini çok iyi biliyorsun! Tanka anında ilave bir {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermisi{/g} yükleyebilirsin.
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: Böyle bir makineyle nasıl baş edeceğini çok iyi biliyorsun! Tanka anında ilave bir {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermisi{/g} yükleyebilirsin.
Onca tatbikat boşa değilmiş! Tanka anında ilave bir {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermisi{/g} yükleyebilirsin.

languages.text: Du weißt recht gut, wie du mit einer solchen Maschine umgehen musst! Du lädst den Panzer sofort mit einer weiteren {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granate{/g}.
languages.original_text: You know quite well how to deal with such a machine! You instantly load an additional {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} into the tank.

traits.locale_text: Du weißt recht gut, wie du mit einer solchen Maschine umgehen musst! Du lädst den Panzer sofort mit einer weiteren {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granate{/g}.
Die Drills waren also doch nicht umsonst! Du lädst sofort eine zusätzliche {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granate{/g} in den Panzer.
